question: Iv'e been unemployed for 6 years now i'm losing all hope!?
question_content: Now im not some college grad or some bullshit like that just a guy with moderate work experience no references no credit no money but no criminal record. I never graduated high school but have some college. Im actually a very intelligent guy and just want any job I have tried sears,K mart sports authority and home depot and oh yes and McDonald's. Home depot interviewed me but didn't hire me sports authority the same. I apply online and am actually get sick of the 120 question quiz each time. I love golf but can't get a job in that field what the ****!! Im losing hope I feel worthless no way to get a job even when Im trying very hard?

answers.answer_content: look dude, you need your high school diploma, you need to go back to school and study something that will put you in a job you will like longterm. And wow golf? wtf.
Would you be my PI and do whatever I need done?
